item.description:
New YEARS EVE PARTY @ The Hide Away

The Hide Away
@ Anthony's
105 Canal St
Malden, MA 02148

Join us at 8:00 pm on December 31, 2009 for an exciting time introducing the New Year 2010.

We will be celebrating in the elegant Terrace Ball Room on the 2nd floor.

We will start the night off with hors d’oeuvres and to be followed by a New Year’s Dinner featuring a buffet and desert, all prepared by our special chef.

During dinner, dance the night away to R&B, Latin and Hip Hop music of D.J. Murph.

In addition we will be having live entertainment with a champagne toast along with noise makers and hats.

Price for this special event is $35.00 per person. Purchase your tickets today before we are sold out............. Tickets are going fast

To PURCHASE your tickets go to www.BlushBoston.com and go to Up Coming Events Page and click on the (Buy Now) button.


WE HAVE 20 ROOMS BLOCKED AT THE MARRIOTT COURTYARD FOR THOSE WHO WISH TO STAY OVER NIGHT. THE PRICE IS $69.00 PLUS TAX. THE ROOMS ARE UNDER BLUSH BOSTON (CODE BBNG).

**Reservations will be taken over the phone only**

Marriott Court Yard
100 Morris St
Revere, MA 02151
Phone: 781 324 1900
Toll Free: 1-866-239-3204
http://www.marriott.c...

TRANSPORTATION will be provided to and from the hotel to The Hide Away at no extra cost. Please notify me once you have booked a room to schedule your pick up. (617 877 1808)

Any questions please call me at 617 877 1808.

• ATM
• Premium Liquor
• (Food)
• 2 Parking Lots (FREE)
• Hours 8:00 p.m. to 1:30 a.m.
• 5 minute WALK from Malden T-Station
item.name: New Years Eve @ The Hide Away
